name: WealthForLife
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly updates from Wealth For Life. You can just say "Alexa, open Wealth For Life".

Different wealth building strategies apply to different levels of wealth. This weekly update can help those in the Top 5% of their professions take wealth to the next level. 

We fight the mediocre, outdated and ineffective financial advice that dominates the financial industry. 

As we watch technology create massive efficiencies in our lives, most people follow wealth building strategies designed 40-50 years ago. Save for 30 years then retire...give me a break. Will you be at the same job in five years? Will your company even be around? 

How about saving for 5 years instead of 30 years and get 200% more retirement income?
How about massively reducing your taxes so you can direct your social capital and values to make the world a better place?
How about providing incredible incentives to keep and retain top talent while reducing company outflows?
This is only part of wealth innovation.
We innovate with technology all the time yet most stick with the "status quo" financial advice.
The same tired old strategies everyone talks about.
There is more out there my friend!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
